Al Safa is a locality in Dubai, United Arab Emirates (UAE). Al Safa is located in western Dubai and is bordered to the north by Jumeirah, to the south by Al Quoz, to the east by Al Wasl, and to the west by Al Manara. Al Safa is bounded to the northwest and southwest by routes D 92 (Al Wasl Road) and E 11 (Sheikh Zayed Road) respectively.

Al Wasl is a well-connected neighbourhood with easy access to most of the leading highways in the city. Located parallel to the longest road in the UAE, Sheikh Zayed Road, its also easy to get on to other highways such as Al Khail Road and Al Ain Road from Al Wasl. When it comes to relying on public transportation, the nearest metro stations are Business Bay and Burj Khalifa/The Dubai Mall stations. While these metro stations are a 7-10 minute walk away, there are several bus routes that also connect the residents of Al Wasl to the popular hotspots in the city. Its fairly easy to hail a taxi and most leading taxi apps have no trouble locating the area.

When it comes to parking spots, both apartment complexes and villas have dedicated parking for residents. Visitors can also easily find paid parking spots in and around the area. For people visiting the popular attractions near Al Wasl, including Dubai Canal and Boxpark, there are plenty of parking spots available.

`

Rising 245 meters into the sky, Al Fattan Marine Towers hold the distinction of being the tallest structures in the JBR area.Completed in 2006, this 50-storey bluish green, aluminum & glass clad twin-tower development brings residential and retail luxury into one self-contained vertical complex in Dubai Marina.

Each tower consisted of serviced and residential apartments that have since been sold to investors and homeowners.A total of 229 premium apartments comprise the Al Fattan Marine Towers 172 of which are three-bedroom units, 53 two bedroom units and 3 duplexes with 3 and 4 bedrooms, and a spacious penthouse.

The upper podium features a leisure deck with fully-equipped health club, swimming pool, sun lounge, garden and other recreational facilities. The ground floor hosts commercial and retail spaces serving both residents and clients from around the area.Al Fattan Marine Towers offer the advantages of close proximity to landmarks such as the Gardens Shopping Mall, The Palm Jumeirah, Dubais media and IT hubs, and the arterial Sheikh Zayed Road.

Features & Amenities

  • On JBR Walk, Sea view and Marina view
  • Floor to ceiling windows, 5 sky lobbies in each tower
  • Panoramic lifts facing the sky lobbies
  • 2 min walk from the tram
  • walking by the beach by 2 min
  • Tram station is just a 5-minute walk away..

Each tower consisted of serviced and residential apartments that have since been sold to investors and homeowners.A total of 229 premium apartments comprise the Al Fattan Marine Towers 172 of which are three-bedroom units, 53 two bedroom units and 3 duplexes with 3 and 4 bedrooms, and a spacious penthouse.

The upper podium features a leisure deck with fully-equipped health club, swimming pool, sun lounge, garden and other recreational facilities. The ground floor hosts commercial and retail spaces serving both residents and clients from around the area.Al Fattan Marine Towers offer the advantages of close proximity to landmarks such as the Gardens Shopping Mall, The Palm Jumeirah, Dubais media and IT hubs, and the arterial Sheikh Zayed Road.

Features & Amenities

  • On JBR Walk, Sea view and Marina view
  • Floor to ceiling windows, 5 sky lobbies in each tower
  • Panoramic lifts facing the sky lobbies
  • 2 min walk from the tram
  • walking by the beach by 2 min
  • Tram station is just a 5-minute walk away..

The 8 is a new residential project located on the man made island, Palm Jumeirah. It has been inspired by cool and chic Miami Style Living. Spread across eight-storeys, the mixed-use development will add around 300 luxurious units comprising of two- and three-bedroom apartments, a limited number of penthouses and signature townhouses.

The resort will also offer a mix of hotel apartments, ranging from one-, two- and three-bedroom units and a presidential suite.If you want to relax your mind, just stay in wide open balconies and stare at the panoramic views of Dubai Skyline. You will also be satisfied of living in the building because of the wide variety of apartments ranging from two, three bedroom, elegant townhouse, and penthouse units. In fact, each of its floors has been designed with fantastic layout, from private gardens, entertainment decks, and pools in townhouses to private lifts of duplex penthouses.

They are just designed with leading and prestigious designer, Kenzo Maison, who provides particularly selected furnishings and accessories set within the lobbies.So, if you prefer to spend your day in The 8, you will enjoy its resort-inspired facilities and amenities such as the following:

ABOUT SHEIKH ZAYED ROAD

Sheikh Zayed Road (SZR) is known as one of the main highways in Dubai and the road that connects the seven emirates. Sheikh Zayed Road not only is the busiest roads in Dubai, but it also has many high-rise buildings that house residential apartments and serviced hotel apartments. The area is always bustling and is popular amongst working professionals due to the close proximity to many business hubs.
  • Best known as the E11 highway that connects the two largest cities of UAE; Dubai and Abu Dhabi
  • It is a highway which stretches from Dubai to the other emirates~
  • Home to many high rise residential skyscrapers
  • It stretches to 558.44 km from Abu Dhabi to Ras Al Khaimah. -
  • It has different names across the other emirates.

Al Safa is a locality in Dubai, United Arab Emirates (UAE). Al Safa is located in western Dubai and is bordered to the north by Jumeirah, to the south by Al Quoz, to the east by Al Wasl, and to the west by Al Manara. Al Safa is bounded to the northwest and southwest by routes D 92 (Al Wasl Road) and E 11 (Sheikh Zayed Road) respectively.

Al Wasl is a well-connected neighbourhood with easy access to most of the leading highways in the city. Located parallel to the longest road in the UAE, Sheikh Zayed Road, its also easy to get on to other highways such as Al Khail Road and Al Ain Road from Al Wasl. When it comes to relying on public transportation, the nearest metro stations are Business Bay and Burj Khalifa/The Dubai Mall stations. While these metro stations are a 7-10 minute walk away, there are several bus routes that also connect the residents of Al Wasl to the popular hotspots in the city. Its fairly easy to hail a taxi and most leading taxi apps have no trouble locating the area.

When it comes to parking spots, both apartment complexes and villas have dedicated parking for residents. Visitors can also easily find paid parking spots in and around the area. For people visiting the popular attractions near Al Wasl, including Dubai Canal and Boxpark, there are plenty of parking spots available.

Located south of Downtown Dubai, lies one of the most recognizable neighborhoods in Dubai, Business Bay. True to its name, the area is home to several commercial buildings featuring high-profile offices, banks and shops. Extremely well connected, the lifestyle in Business Bay is ideal for professionals working in Business Bay, Downtown Dubai and DIFC. The area also has some of the leading hotel chains from across the world including Oberoi, Taj, and Marriott.

With a selection of beautiful apartments, hotel apartments and hotels, it has grown into a coveted address in the city eliciting an equal amount of interest from renters, buyers and tourists. Business Bay is also at closely located to the up-and-coming design destination, Dubai Design District and one of Dubais oldest hotspots, Jumeirah.

Stretching over 80 million sq. ft., Business Bay is a prime location in the city, featuring a mix of properties. Most of the residential properties in the area are apartments and the Business Bay buildings are part of Dubai's skyline. There are a few pavilion villas for rent in the Executive Towers compound apart from the Sky Villas and the Marasi floating villas along the Dubai Canal. In terms of the configurations of the properties, you find a large number of studios, 1,2 and 3-bedroom apartments in Business Bay and a few 4-bedroom luxury apartments and penthouses for rent.

ABOUT SHEIKH ZAYED ROAD

Sheikh Zayed Road (SZR) is known as one of the main highways in Dubai and the road that connects the seven emirates. Sheikh Zayed Road not only is the busiest roads in Dubai, but it also has many high-rise buildings that house residential apartments and serviced hotel apartments. The area is always bustling and is popular amongst working professionals due to the close proximity to many business hubs.

  • Best known as the E11 highway that connects the two largest cities of UAE; Dubai and Abu Dhabi
  • It is a highway which stretches from Dubai to the other emirates
  • Home to many high rise residential skyscrapers.
  • It stretches to 558.44 km from Abu Dhabi to Ras Al Khaimah
  • It has different names across the other emirates.

Dubai Industrial City (DI) is one of the largest industrial hubs in Dubai. Strategically positioned, it lies close to Maktoum Airport, Jebel Ali Port, the Expo 2020 Dubai site, and key highways including Emirates Road and Sheikh Mohammed Bin Zayed Road.Its key objective is to fast track the growth and expansion of the industrial sector of the UAE and it provides a cost-efficient business environment with industrial land, labor villages and warehousing facilities.

Other amenities include logistic solution support, commercial office spaces, open storage yards and retail showrooms with storage.Dubai Industrial City is already home to players in the light and medium manufacturing sectors which include food and beverage, base metals, transport equipment and parts, machinery and mechanical equipment, workshops, logistics, chemicals, and mineral products.

Al Wasl is a locality in Dubai, United Arab Emirates (UAE). The locality is located in western Dubai, between the first and second interchanges of route E 11 (Sheikh Zayed Road). Al Wasl is a residential community and is bordered to the north by Jumeirah, to the south by Business Bay, to west by Al Safa and to the east by Al Satwa.

The population of Al Wasl is 10,736 as the population estimation at the end of 2017.  The locality gets its name from a historic British reference to the city of Dubai. Important landmarks in the locality include the publishing offices of Gulf News and Al Bayan, Al Mazaya Centre and Safa Park.

Al Quoz is located in western Dubai, bordered to the north by Al Wasl, to the west by Umm Al Sheif, Al Manara and Al Safa, forming a long rectangle between Al Khail and Sheikh Zayed Roads. Al Quoz consists of a mainly residential area in the northeast and an industrial area in the southwest with four sub communities. It is also the oldest and the biggest industrial area in Dubai as well as known for its many art galleries, housed in warehouse spaces. Al Quoz Industrial Areas 1, 2, 3 and 4 are in the southwest of the rectangle. They have been developed by Dubai Municipality as industrial and mass accommodation areas.

Falcon City of Wonders is a mega project designed to engrave the Emirate of Dubai  a place both in the minds and hearts of the end-users and property investors.

It is a project that honors mankind through its various civilizations and a project that could inspire generations about the power of the human spirit in particular. It is also where the world will see its past, its present, and even its future.This project has outstretched wings that symbolize the spirit of leadership, pride, and excellent qualities. It is a self-contained and multi-faceted residential, tourist, and recreational destination which are formed according to wonders of the ancient and modern world or will feature the seven wonders of the world, such as the Egyptian Pyramids, Taj Mahal, Eiffel Tower, Hanging Gardens of Babylon, Leading Tower of Pisa, and other residential and commercial developments. 

There are a number of townhouses ranging from two, three and four bedroom units as well as three, four and five bedroom villas. There is also another type of villas which is called as Semi-detached Villas ranging from three and four bedroom units.
